channel.title: Mutton on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Mutton on Cooking

item.title: Lamb Biriyani
item.description: This recipe makes an Southern Indian (Tamil) style Lamb biriyani that has been adapted to a more western audience (aka a bit less spicy) and can be made with either Lamb or Mutton. Best served with a sauce such as an Onion Raitha website. A plated rendering of the dish, made with Mutton. Makes a really hearty ,meaty and delicious dish. The dishes uses a rice to meat ratio of 2:3.
